animeTitle: Zhu Zhu Xia: Yong Chuang Weilai Cheng
animeDescription: This time, G.G. Bond is sent to 2080 to find a world divided, where the poor live on a lower, polluted level. He finds that his primary school, Parents' Hope School, is about to be taken over by a competitor, Super Technology School. To defend against this, he must win sports competitions to raise funds.(Source: Wikipedia)
animeRelated: ['Prequel: Zhu Zhu Xia: Wu Xia 2008', 'Sequel: Bai Bian Zhu Zhu Xia']
